    public class LoginActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Purpose: this class allows the user to create a pass code to access the app. it also generates a secret key for the user to encrypt and decrypt their data.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void confirmPasscode()
      Purpose: Confirms the user pass code - this method runs on first time application use.
      private void createDB()
      Purpose: Creates a new database for the first time user once the login is verified.
      private void createSecretKey(java.lang.String userCode)
      Purpose: generates a 32 byte random secret key for encrypting and decrypting data.
      private java.lang.String decryptData(java.lang.String dataToDecrypt)
      Purpose: decrypts data from the database before displaying to the user.
      private void DisplayHelp()
      Purpose: Displays help messages to the user.
      private void enterPasscode()
      Purpose: gets the pass code the user enters - checks if it contains unacceptable characters - if not it stores it temporarily or else it displays message to user.
      private void getExistingPasscode()
      Purpose: Checks if data and database file exists - otherwise it gets first time users to verify pass code.
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      private void openMainActivity()
      Purpose: launches the main activity.

      Purpose: displays pop up alerts to the user.

      Purpose: resets text fields depending on entry of confirmation status.

      Purpose: resets the text fields for re-entering / confirming first time pass codes.

      Purpose: Saves the user pass code to the database table.

      Purpose: checks for invalid characters in the user code.
      private void verifyPasscode(java.lang.String code)
      Purpose: Verifies the user pass code - this method runs when the database exists.

        Purpose: Verifies the user pass code - this method runs when the database exists.

        private void confirmPasscode()
        Purpose: Confirms the user pass code - this method runs on first time application use.

      • createSecretKey

        private void createSecretKey(java.lang.String userCode)
        Purpose: generates a 32 byte random secret key for encrypting and decrypting data. stores the secret key in the keyClass.
        Parameters:
        userCode - the pass code entered by the user.

      • decryptData

        private java.lang.String decryptData(java.lang.String dataToDecrypt)
        Purpose: decrypts data from the database before displaying to the user.
        Parameters:
        dataToDecrypt - the data to decrypt.
        Returns:
        the decrypted data for displaying to the user.

      • createDB

        private void createDB()
        Purpose: Creates a new database for the first time user once the login is verified.

        private void saveToDB(java.lang.String code)
        Purpose: Saves the user pass code to the database table.
        Parameters:
        code - the users login code after encrypting.
